title: RRB Group D Recruitment 2026
description: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) will conduct Group D (Level-1) recruitment for posts like Track Maintainer, Helper and Assistant in various departments. Selection will be through CBT, Physical Efficiency Test (PET) and Document Verification.

title: RBI Office Assistant Recruitment 2026
description: Reserve Bank of India has released Office Assistant recruitment notification. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official RBI website.

title: PSSSB Group D Recruitment 2026
description: Punjab PSSSB Group D recruitment notification released. Selection will be done through written examination and document verification.

title: CTET Admit Card 2026 Released
qualification: For CTET Paper I & II Candidates
lastdate: Exam as per schedule mentioned on admit card
description: Central Teacher Eligibility Test (CTET) 2026 admit card has been released by CBSE. Candidates can download their admit card using application number and date of birth. Admit card contains exam date, shift timing, exam centre details and important instructions. Candidates must carry a printed admit card along with a valid photo ID to the examination centre.

title: PSSSB Group D Admit Card 2025
description: PSSSB Group D examination admit card is now available for download on the official website.

title: Punjab Police Constable Result 2025
description: Punjab Police Constable examination result has been declared. Candidates can check their result online.

title: PSSSB Clerk Recruitment 2026
qualification: Graduation Plus Computer Certificate or Computer Subject in Qualification
description: Punjab Subordinate Services Selection Board (PSSSB) ne Clerk aur Clerk (IT) posts ke liye 2026 me recruitment notification jari kiya hai. Yeh Group-C level ki government job hai

title: Indian Air Force Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 Recruitment
qualification: 10+2 (Science) with Physics & Mathematics OR 3 Year Diploma in Engineering OR 2 Year Vocational Course
description: Indian Air Force has released the official notification for Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 under the Agnipath Scheme. Online applications are invited from unmarried male and female candidates. The recruitment is for a service period of 4 years. Selection process includes online written exam, Physical Fitness Test (PFT), Adaptability Tests and Medical Examination. Online application starts from 12 January 2026. Written exam is expected to be held on 30 & 31 March 2026.
